snippet: Thailand's top generals lured the former government and its supporters into a trap by arranging peace talks between political heavyweights then seizing power in a coup moments later, a deposed minister said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Fugitive Thai Minister Says Army Led Government Into Trap
headline.main: Exclusive: Fugitive Thai Minister Says Army Led Government Into Trap

lead_paragraph: Thailand's top generals lured the former government and its supporters into a trap by arranging peace talks between political heavyweights then seizing power in a coup moments later, a deposed minister said on Sunday.
